description.text:
Projection mapping of the Calligrafuturism artwork on the Chirkei Hydroelectric Power Station on the river Sulak near the Dubki settlement, Kazbekovsky district, Dagestan.

The most powerful hydroelectric power plant in the North Caucasus, the lights of which were specially turned off for experimental photo project by Pokras Lampas.

Project dedicated to the balance between Nature and Anthropogenic human activity, Hydroelectric Power and Data Mining technology, Creation and Consumption.

As twilight dims the day
the scent of snow fill the air
sprinkle joy in this magical seasons for
celebration – Winter Twilight

Digital drawing/ 2732pxX2048px

We are proud to introduce many of the world’s most admired works of art, but with a green, slimy twist! In this collection, our favorite pond-dweller Pepe the Frog appears framed in amphibious, golden splendor.

What has startled our dear friend Pepe so?

Take a look, and experience this beauty fit for the walls of a museum, or even just the walls of your lily pad.

Pepe's Scream by Soliiiart
foundation.app/@soliiiart

Inspired by "The Scream " by Edvard Munch's masterpiece (1893)

And in the immortal words of 🐸 : “ribbit.”

This place is very popular in Japan as a place where you can see Mt.Fuji. It is also highly supported and known by many people both in Japan and abroad. Mt.Fuji, a symbol of Japan, and traditional Japanese architecture can be seen together.

The Jedi in this picture is my daughter.
She apparently wants to become a Jedi knight. I'm not a Jedi, so I can't teach her anything, but she can already handle the Force.
This is the shrine in Odaiba that such Jedi knights are said to visit first.

May the Force be with you.

This picture is of a temple in Taipei.
There are many temples, shrines , and other faiths and religions in this world.
It is up to each person to decide what they believe in and what they wish for. God, Buddha, or a guru hears and understands the wishes and desires of such people. Have you ever thought about the feelings of such gods and buddhas ?
There are so many people, and I have to listen to everyone. It's tough.
May God and Buddha rest in peace.
In Japan, there is almost no religion. My family is Buddhist , but I've almost never heard of that enlightenment. Personally , I love Mary.

items.title: How much is this NFT worth?

description.text:
Sale of CryptoPunk #7523 at NativelyDigital NFT auction – setting a new world auction record for a single CryptoPunk, despite many people outside of nft space were thinking nft's are dead

Inspired from French artist Jean-Léon Gérôme "The Carpet Merchant" 1887
created by - Rishiraj singh Aug 2021
size -2194x2408

Leonardo Da Capricciosa & Polygonium Yogurtium revealing the one and only original! Coming in 30000x16813 pixel and a signed print for the owner (also a hug if you want that).
3D Rendering with lots of painting love ontop. Studied DaVinci weeks for this in order to catch the original vibes and hidden gems. There's a lot to discover in there!
HIGH RES PREVIEW: https://bit.ly/3rpN2fR
The buyer will get a drive link to the original resolution as foundation took that feature away. Just contact me.

One autumn night.
The child awoke to the intense light shining through the curtains.
Her parents haven't returned home yet.
Then who is it?
The mysterious vibrations and resonances that come in little by little.
The child left the room with his half-asleep body and it stood in the living room.

Internet treating artists, with their thumbs and opinions trying to control the artist,their creativity,their choices....... lets be free art is about freedom

Inspired from Pollice Verso, an 1872 painting by Jean-Léon Gérôme
created by - Rishiraj singh Sep. 2021
size -5209x3499
